# minimumTimeOffsetFromLive

**Instance Property**

A time value that indicates how closely playback follows the latest live stream content.

## Declaration

```swift
var minimumTimeOffsetFromLive: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

This property value is only valid when working with live streaming content. For non-live assets, this property value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/invalid].

## Accessing duration and timing

- **duration**: A time value that indicates the asset’s duration.
- **providesPreciseDurationAndTiming**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset provides precise duration and timing.
